Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Reactive oxygen species modulator 1 (ROS modulator 1; zebrafish, chordates, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: S. aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and M. tuberculosis.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against a variety of bacteria. Acts by inducing bacterial membrane breakage (By similarity).
Sequence Information.Comments: Induces production of reactive oxygen species (ROS) which are necessary for cell proliferation. May play a role in inducing oxidative DNA damage and replicative senescence. May play a role in the coordination of mitochondrial morphology and cell proliferation.
